author: hlship
msg: Only bind a field to a container property (matching the field's id) if such a property actually exists.

author: kstam
msg: juddi-93. Enabling RMI access to JUDDI. This is not using any framework, to not introduce more dependencies
however this also means there is no connection pooling and we have to self register it to jndi. This
can be done by running a servlet load-on-startup, see the commented section in the web.xml.
